verses.verse: Call <S%H7121><s%> now <S%H3426><s%>; is there any that will answer <S%H6030><s%> thee <S%H6918><s%>? And to which of the holy ones wilt thou turn <S%H6437><s%>?
For vexation <S%H3708><s%> killeth <S%H2026><s%> the foolish man <S%H191><s%>, And jealousy <S%H7068><s%> slayeth <S%H4191><s%> the silly one <S%H6601><s%>.
I have seen <S%H7200><s%> the foolish <S%H191><s%> taking root <S%H8327><s%>: But suddenly <S%H6597><s%> I cursed <S%H5344><s%> his habitation <S%H5116><s%>.
His children <S%H1121><s%> are far <S%H7368><s%> from safety <S%H3468><s%>, And they are crushed <S%H1792><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%>, Neither is there any to deliver them <S%H5337><s%>:

Whose harvest <S%H7105><s%> the hungry <S%H7457><s%> eateth up <S%H398><s%>, And taketh <S%H3947><s%> it even out <S%H413><s%> of the thorns <S%H6791><s%>; And the snare <S%H6782><s%> gapeth <S%H7602><s%> for their substance <S%H2428><s%>.
For affliction <S%H205><s%> cometh not forth <S%H3318><s%> from the dust <S%H6083><s%>, Neither doth trouble <S%H5999><s%> spring out <S%H6779><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%>;
But man <S%H120><s%> is born <S%H3205><s%> unto trouble <S%H5999><s%>, As the sparks <S%H1121><s%> fly <S%H5774><s%> upward <S%H1361><s%>.
But as for me <S%H199><s%>, I would seek unto God <S%H410><s%>, And unto God <S%H430><s%> would I commit <S%H7760><s%> my cause <S%H1700><s%>;
Who doeth <S%H6213><s%> great things <S%H1419><s%> and unsearchable <S%H369><s%>, Marvellous things <S%H6381><s%> without number <S%H4557><s%>:
Who giveth <S%H5414><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, And sendeth <S%H7971><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> the fields <S%H2351><s%>;
So that he setteth up <S%H7760><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%> those that are low <S%H8217><s%>, And those that mourn <S%H6937><s%> are exalted <S%H7682><s%> to safety <S%H3468><s%>.
He frustrateth <S%H6565><s%> the devices <S%H4284><s%> of the crafty <S%H6175><s%>, So that their hands <S%H3027><s%> cannot perform <S%H6213><s%> their enterprise <S%H8454><s%>.
He taketh <S%H3920><s%> the wise <S%H2450><s%> in their own craftiness <S%H6193><s%>; And the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the cunning <S%H6617><s%> is carried headlong <S%H4116><s%>.
They meet <S%H6298><s%> with darkness <S%H2822><s%> in the day-time <S%H3119><s%>, And grope <S%H4959><s%> at noonday <S%H6672><s%> as in the night <S%H3915><s%>.
But he saveth <S%H3467><s%> from the sword <S%H2719><s%> of their mouth <S%H6310><s%>, Even the needy <S%H34><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the mighty <S%H2389><s%>.
So the poor <S%H1800><s%> hath hope <S%H8615><s%>, And iniquity <S%H5766><s%> stoppeth <S%H7092><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
Behold <S%H835><s%>, happy is the man <S%H582><s%> whom God <S%H433><s%> correcteth <S%H3198><s%>: Therefore despise <S%H3988><s%> not thou the chastening <S%H4148><s%> of the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>.
For he maketh sore <S%H3510><s%>, and bindeth up <S%H2280><s%>; He woundeth <S%H4272><s%>, and his hands <S%H3027><s%> make whole <S%H7495><s%>.
He will deliver <S%H5337><s%> thee in six <S%H8337><s%> troubles <S%H6869><s%>; Yea <S%H7651><s%>, in seven there shall no evil <S%H7451><s%> touch thee <S%H5060><s%>.
In famine <S%H7458><s%> he will redeem <S%H6299><s%> thee from death <S%H4194><s%>; And in war <S%H4421><s%> from the power <S%H3027><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>.
Thou shalt be hid <S%H2244><s%> from the scourge <S%H7752><s%> of the tongue <S%H3956><s%>; Neither shalt thou be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of destruction <S%H7701><s%> when it cometh <S%H935><s%>.
At destruction <S%H7701><s%> and dearth <S%H3720><s%> thou shalt laugh <S%H7832><s%>; Neither shalt thou be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
For thou shalt be in league <S%H1285><s%> with the stones <S%H68><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>; And the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall be at peace with thee <S%H7999><s%>.
And thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that thy tent <S%H168><s%> is in peace <S%H7965><s%>; And thou shalt visit <S%H6485><s%> thy fold <S%H5116><s%>, and shalt miss nothing <S%H2398><s%>.
Thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> also that thy seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be great <S%H7227><s%>, And thine offspring <S%H6631><s%> as the grass <S%H6212><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
Thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> to thy grave <S%H6913><s%> in a full age <S%H3624><s%>, Like as a shock of grain <S%H1430><s%> cometh in <S%H5927><s%> in its season <S%H6256><s%>.
Lo this <S%H2713><s%>, we have searched it <S%H8085><s%>, so it is; Hear it <S%H3045><s%>, and know thou it for thy good.
